shapes
Class Sphere

java.lang.Object
  shapes.Shape
      shapes.Shape3D
          shapes.Sphere

public class Sphere
extends Shape3D

Represents a Sphere defined by its width, height and length (which are the same) and x and y coordinates.

Version:
9/27/15
Author:
Ashley Helfinstein

Constructor Detail

Sphere

public Sphere(int x,
              int y,
              int z,
              int w,
              int h,
              int l)
Sets up a sphere with the center at (x,y,z) and a radius of w/2 or h/2 or l/2

Parameters:
x - the x coordinate of the center of the sphere
y - the y coordinate of the center of the sphere
z - the z coordinate of the center of the sphere
w - the width of the sphere (along the x axis)
h - the height of the sphere (along the y axis)
l - the length of the sphere (along the z axis)
Precondition:
w,h and l must all be equal

Finds the volume of the sphere

draw

public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
Draws the sphere to the screen using ellipses to show 3 dimensions

Overrides:
draw in class Shape
Parameters:
drawer - the PApplet that can draw the sphere to the screen
Postcondition:
The drawer has some state changes. See the Shape draw method for more information.
